Besides, it ____ also ____ design ____ machinery, medical ____, ____ or ____ other ____ where ____ functionality ____ safety ____ involved. data.partBlankContent: Structural engineering is a subset of civil engineering dealing with the design and analysis of buildings and large non-building structures to withstand both the gravity and wind loads as well as natural disasters. Besides, it m__ also co___ design o_ machinery, medical equi_____, vehi____ or a__ other obj____ where struc_____ functionality o_ safety a__ involved. data.fullContent: Structural engineering is a subset of civil engineering dealing with the design and analysis of buildings and large non-building structures to withstand both the gravity and wind loads as well as natural disasters. Besides, it may also cover design of machinery, medical equipment, vehicles or any other objects where structural functionality or safety are involved. Structural engineers must ensure their designs satisfy building codes.
data.answer: 结构工程是土木工程的一个组成部分，它涉及建筑和大型非建筑结构的设计和分析，以承受重力和风荷载以及自然灾害。此外，它还包括机械、医疗设备、车辆或涉及结构功能及安全的任何其他物体的设计。结构工程师必须确保他们的设计符合建筑规范。
